text.section: For administrative purposes, the selection committee shall be attached to the Finance and Administration Cabinet.

The cabinet shall provide the selection committee with:
Suitable quarters in Frankfort, Kentucky, in which to conduct its business;
An executive secretary and any other staff support necessary for the expeditious conduct of the selection committee's duties and responsibilities; and
Office supplies.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
